entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
